channel.title: I Wanna Be The Guy - The hardest game ever made
channel.description:
Yeah, title says it all.
http://kayin.pyoko.org/iwbtg/
I have successfully completed 3 out of 6 bosses in this ridiculously hard game, and i have spend around 2 frustrating days on trying to complete it. At certain points you just want to mash your computer into tiny pieces, rebuild it and do it again. I can honestly say it's a fucking nightmare.
Anyways, enjoy

item.title: I Wanna Be The Guy - The hardest game ever made
item.dc:creator: @Erj Erj
item.description:
@Erj wrote:

Hardest game ever made? Try the MK Trilogy game for the n64 and very hard mode or even MK2 for the SNES… Bullshit cpu’s.

Read full topic

item.title: I Wanna Be The Guy - The hardest game ever made
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“Squigglyo, post:16, topic:255059”][quote author=Speljohan link=topic=337029.msg2634867#msg2634867 date=1232430364]

ok, attempting to play it now. be back when its completed

See you in a few years, thanks for filling the forums with useless threads!

while difficult, it wasnt impossible.
That was a fun few days, got anything else?

[in no particular order, all NES games]

  1. Megaman 1
  2. Silver Surfer
  3. Battletoads
  4. The Adventures of Bayou Billy
  5. Back to the Future
  6. Ninja Gaiden
  7. Contra 3 for SNES
  8. Ghostbusters 2 [I spent so many hours on this game…]

mmm i played half of those games when they where new, lol.
good times. god i miss good games
[/quote]This. Thesedays games are shit in comparison. Back then majority of games were high quality

back in the day games took weeks, if not months to defeat. The concepts where new, the gameplay was fun, the controlls where easy.
All games out now are almost the complete oppisite :’( god i miss good games[/quote]Indeed. Today it’s all about the graphics, which results in fail. It is very rare a new good game is released.

Read full topic
item.source: I Wanna Be The Guy - The hardest game ever made

item.title: I Wanna Be The Guy - The hardest game ever made
item.dc:creator: @PeterMan PeterMan
item.description:
@PeterMan wrote:

OMG, I just remember. I got a NES and a SNES lying around somewhere. Used to be my brother’s, I don’t think I was even born when NES came out.

I remember playing some games on the NES when I was little. Like old super mario, Duck hunt, some caveman on a skateboard or something epic like that.

Read full topic

item.title: I Wanna Be The Guy - The hardest game ever made
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“PeterMan, post:6, topic:255059”]I don’t get how to avoid the spiked wall on lvl 1. I get past the 2 first, but the third comes so fast. :S[/quote]Protip: double-jump to the left down there. spikes are triggered when you hit the ground. directly below gap. Besides, you won’t figure out how to continue after them. I suggest left, right or top path. (left and right are behind the spikes that come out, you can just walk through the wall after you trigger them)

Read full topic
item.source: I Wanna Be The Guy - The hardest game ever made

item.title: I Wanna Be The Guy - The hardest game ever made
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“PaulT, post:2, topic:255059”]This game is truly gnarly, and worth the time investment for the truly cruel level of difficulty involved. If Mario smoked crack, he would be that guy.[/quote]Indeed. I am on the Mother Brain boss now, and it’s without doubt the hardest one this far.

This game is seriously like the old impossible 8-bit games but 999 times worse.

Read full topic
item.source: I Wanna Be The Guy - The hardest game ever made
